header.desc: Monitor your SolaX PV system. To enter, you need two parameters TokenID and SN. Where to find them, check here -
header.desc2: If you want to see the application without having a PV installation, click -

production.extraInfo: If some data is unavailable to you, it probably means that you do not have an energy meter. Remember that it is not needed for the installation to work, you simply will not see some parameters.
